The vessel you choose significanly influences your sip experience through a combination of science and sensory perception.
Any drink that you'd serve straight up can go in a coupe, shaken or stirred, without any ice.
Typically wide-trimmed with a thick base making it easy to muddle berries or other ingredients before the main liquid is added.
Used to serve drinks that contain a large proportion of a mixer, and are poured over ice.
